name: janitor
desc: You see a smiling person wearing a workers uniform that is slightly dirty now but you can tell was tidy and neat earlier in the day.
long: Well Hi...  I wasn't expecting to see a nice student like you still here. You better get on home before your parents get worried. But wait a minute, your back pack is torn. There on the side. Look in the supply room there and see if you can find something to fix it.
short: Look in the supply room for something to fix the tear in your backpack.
hint: You can fix almost anything with duct tape. You can even make a wallet from duct tape.
